title: Rutgers Physics and Mathematics Textbooks (Better Copy)
description:
This is a torrent containing almost all textbooks needed to complete a math or physics major at rutgers university. It is missing some of the lower level books because they are special rutgers edition or need some fuckin online access card anyway. Most of the books are the correct edition but these things change so watch out for that I guess. There are also a couple solutions manuals. Though this torrent is made specifically for rutgers students many of the books are standard so this torrent will most likely be useful to any physics and math student. Good Luck!		

Contains the following:

Abstract Algebra_ An Introduction, Hungerford.pdf
Algebra 2nd Edition, Artin.pdf
An Introduction To Error Analysis, Taylor.pdf
An Introduction to Mathematical Cryptography, Pipher, Hoffstein, Silverman.pdf
An Introduction To Mechanics, Daniel Kleppner, Robert Kolenkow.pdf
An Introduction to Thermal Physics, Daniel Schroeder.pdf
A Transition to Advanced Mathematics 7th Ed, Smith, Eggen, Andre.pdf
Biological Physics, Philip Nelson.pdf
Classical Mechanics, John Taylor.pdf
Differential Geometry of Curves and Surfaces, Manfredo DoCarmo.pdf
Elementary Differential Equations and Boundary Value Problems, Boyce, Diprima.pdf
Elementary Linear Algebra, Spence, Insel, Friedberg.pdf
Elementary Number Theory and its Applications, Kenneth Rosen.pdf
Elements of Set Theory, Enderton.pdf
Fundamentals of Physics, Halliday, Resnick, Walker.pdf
Galaxies in the Universe, Sparke, Gallagher.pdf
Game Theory, Michael Maschler, Eilon Solan, Shmuel Zamir.pdf
Geometry, David Brannan.pdf
Introduction to Cosmology, Barbara Ryden.pdf
Introduction to Electrodynamics 3rd Edition, David J Griffiths.pdf
Introduction to Electrodynamics Solutions Manual, David Griffiths.pdf
Introduction to Elementary Particles, David Griffiths.pdf
Introduction to Nuclear and Particle Physics, Das _ Ferbel.pdf
Introduction to Nuclear and Particle Physics Solutions Manual.pdf
Introduction to Probability Models, Sheldon M Ross.pdf
Introduction to Quantum Mechanics 2nd Edition, David J. Griffiths.pdf
Introduction to Quantum Mechanics 2nd Edition Solutions.pdf
Modern Physics for Scientists and Engineers 4th Edition, Thornton, Rex.pdf
Modern Quantum Mechanics, 2nd Edition, Sakurai, Napolitano.pdf
Principles of Astrophysics Using Gravity and Stellar Physics to Explore the Cosmos, Charles Keeton.pdf
Principles of Mathematical Analysis, Walter Rudin.pdf
Principles of Quantum Mechanics, Ramamurti Shankar.pdf
Topology 2nd Edition, James Munkres.pdf
